[p][img has_big="true"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/5fc63c0ab7b488471cf57b286dd7d1cd.avif?t=1743246253[/img][/p][p][b]Prepare to unravel the mysteries of The Anomaly Project![/b]  

[/p][h2]CAN YOU AND YOUR TEAM FIGURE OUT WHATS OUT OF THE ORDINARY?[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/b1c298a1b815977acadd9545c6c03409.poster.avif?t=1743246253" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/b1c298a1b815977acadd9545c6c03409.webm?t=1743246253"][/imgvid][/p][p][/p][p][img has_big="true"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/cf0a1b1d14708d530c88a6626b86f147.avif?t=1743246253[/img][/p][p][b]VanossGaming • KYRSP33DY • Forsen[/b] • [b]Yogscast[/b] • H2ODelirious • Terroriser • Nogla • BasicallyIDoWork • Lui Calibe • 8-BitRyan • CaRtOoNz • TheDeluxe4 •  Elraenn • SideArms4Reason • ChilledChaosGAME • Hat Films • Kilira Cooper • Nino MssClick • luthfi halimawan • Jeni Gaming • [b]And many more...[/b][/p][h2][img has_big="true"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/c8f49e09a52028e9aa645db0c04766e5.avif?t=1743246253[/img][/h2][p]In The Anomaly Project you and [b]co-players[/b] have to [b]try and escape[/b] by noticing [b]Anomalies[/b] and making the decision to go in either the Red tube or the Green tube. If you have decided correctly you progress to the next level. Otherwise you are reset to the first level. Will you ever escape...? [/p][h2][img has_big="true"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/2e0d0c5169ef06843d0f6afa8b2993e4.avif?t=1743246253[/img][/h2][list][*][p] [b]1-8 player online co-op[/b]
Explore a multiplayer experience with up to 8 players. Communicate and help each other through [b]text chat[/b] or [b]proximity voice chat[/b][/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] [b]Get to the exit[/b] 
Navigating through the levels, some more mysterious than others, you'll encounter anomalies that defy logic and reason. Keep your senses sharp as you search for hidden clues and spot anomalies to get closer towards escaping at Level 10[/p][/*][/list][h2][img has_big="true"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/34ebbe11cb5bdb8f03a3e4fb7f61d2cb.avif?t=1743246253[/img][/h2][list][*][p] 1-8 player online co-op[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Replayability[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Socialize with friends or strangers[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Chat & Voicechat[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Immerse yourself in a liminal space atmospheres[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Puzzles[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Get frightened, jumpscares[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] Finding anomalies[/p][/*][/list][list][*][p] 5 Anomaly maps [/p][/*][*][p]PLINKO![/p][/*][/list][h2]EXPLORE MULTIPLE MAPS, WITH EACH THEIR OWN THEMES AND CHALLENGING ANOMALIES[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/3e33165588c2a6a006528c4b585e06f8.poster.avif?t=1743246253" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/3e33165588c2a6a006528c4b585e06f8.webm?t=1743246253"][/imgvid][/p][h2]SOME ANOMALIES ARE CRAZIER THAN OTHERS... OH YEAH, BE CAREFULL OF JUMPSCARES[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/30fbf8fdb48ae37b1d07b1fabf0c32f7.poster.avif?t=1743246253" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/30fbf8fdb48ae37b1d07b1fabf0c32f7.webm?t=1743246253"][/imgvid][/p][h2]MAKE THE CORRECT CHOICES BY GOING EITHER IN THE RED OR GREEN PIPE[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/2ca02a348d7a872cee0d2d1ec71b05e8.poster.avif?t=1743246253" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/2ca02a348d7a872cee0d2d1ec71b05e8.webm?t=1743246253"][/imgvid][/p][h2]EXPERIENCE THE CRAZINESS OF OUR NEW MAP 'STAIRS'[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/6def81a772b324e5cd9bc475882382be.poster.avif?t=1743246253" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/6def81a772b324e5cd9bc475882382be.webm?t=1743246253"][/imgvid][/p][h2]GET A GOOD FRIGHT WITH YOUR FRIENDS, WITH THE NEW DARK MODE[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/f2ff7e9a295f96abdff0dc4d0b466e1e.poster.avif?t=1743246253" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2960770/extras/f2ff7e9a295f96abdff0dc4d0b466e1e.webm?t=1743246253"][/imgvid][/p][p]Prepare to unravel the mysteries of The Anomaly Project. Can you escape, or will you become lost forever? It's up to you, but remember, not everything is as it seems...

[/p]
data.strSnippet: Your goal is simple, spot anomalies to escape. Play alone or together with up to 8 players in online co-op. Make the right decisions to advance to the next level, or risk being reset to the beginning!
